body_html: If you build TF with MKL support, the MKL library will detect your CPU architecture (at runtime) and use the appropriate instruction set for that CPU (so you'll get optimizations that work for that particular CPU). Is this what you mean by dynamic dispatch?
body_text: If you build TF with MKL support, the MKL library will detect your CPU architecture (at runtime) and use the appropriate instruction set for that CPU (so you'll get optimizations that work for that particular CPU). Is this what you mean by dynamic dispatch?
body: If you build TF with MKL support, the MKL library will detect your CPU architecture (at runtime) and use the appropriate instruction set for that CPU (so you'll get optimizations that work for that particular CPU). Is this what you mean by dynamic dispatch?
